A-l The Jeffersonian Heritage - 13 half-hour programs on seven 12” discs.
33 1/3 rpm. The series stars Claude Rains as Thomas Jeffersono
The programs show how Jefferson's ideas relate to the present
day. Dramatic format. Series released on the NAEB Network on
September 15, 1952. A few of the program titles are: ‘'The
Living Declaration," "The Democrat and the Commissar," and
"Divided We Stand." Price per album: $25*00.
A-2 People Under Communism - 7 hour-long programs on seven 12" discs.
33 1/3 rpm. Documentary format. Series released on the Network
December 7, 1952, Program titles are: "Terror as a System of
Power," "Music to Order," "The Men Who Make the Migs," "Drama
to Order," "Literature to Order," "Pattern of World Conflict,"
and "The Music and the Dream." Price per album: $25.00.
A-3 The Ways of Mankind (Series I) - 13 half-hour programs on seven 12"
discs. 33 1/3 rpm. Dramatic format. Released on the Network
December 14, 1952. Some of the titles are: "A Word in Your
Ear," "When Greek Meets Greek," and "Survival." Price per album:
$25.00,
A-4 The Ways of Mankind (Series II) - 13 half-hour programs on seven
12" discs. 33 1/3 rpm. Dramatic format. Released on the Network
October 4, 1953. This album contains the sub-series on Law and
Justice, The Yurok Indian Culture, and The Balinese Culture.
Price per album: $25.00
Single records from any of the above albums may be purchased for
$4.00 each.
Scripts are available for The Jeffersonian Heritage, in book form,
from the Beacon Press, 25 Beacon Street, Boston 8, Massachusetts.
The price is $3.50.
